advanced-elicitation.status: Not Available in SAGE Standalone Mode
advanced-elicitation.description: This is a placeholder for the advanced elicitation task system. The full implementation exists in upstream SAGE.
advanced-elicitation.usage: If agents reference this file, they should display a message: "Advanced elicitation not available in SAGE standalone mode"
advanced-elicitation.alternatives: - Use basic elicitation in story creation workflows - Implement SAGE-specific elicitation logic - Integrate with upstream SAGE system
